results.title: Inhibition of Cholesterol Synthesis in T Cells Protects the Liver Against Steatosis, Inflammation, and Oxidative Stress in Metabolic Dysfunction-Associated Steatohepatitis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ alleviated the progression of MCD-diet-induced @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@MASH@@@, accompanied by the decreased infiltration of T cells.

results.title: Simvastatin Improves Microcirculatory Function in Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Disease and Downregulates Oxidative and ALE-RAGE Stress
results.text_hl: Recently, an international expert panel proposed the term @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@metabolic dysfunction-associated fatty liver disease@@@ "MAFLD" as a new terminology that more accurately reflects the pathogenesis of @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@fatty liver disease@@@.

results.title: High fat plus high cholesterol diet lead to hepatic steatosis in zebrafish larvae: a novel model for screening anti-hepatic steatosis drugs
results.text_hl: In addition, the effects of @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on HFC diet-induced @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@steatosis@@@ were evaluated.

results.title: [Different serum lipid adjustment drugs for the treatment of hyperlipidemic fatty liver].
results.journal: Zhonghua Gan Zang Bing Za Zhi
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To research the effect of different serum @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ adjustment drugs, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Fenofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011345 @@@Fenofibrate@@@, on @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@hyperlipidemic fatty liver@@@.

results.title: Ilexgenin A enhances the effects of simvastatin on non-alcoholic fatty liver disease without changes in simvastatin pharmacokinetics.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_ilexgenin_A @CHEMICAL_MESH:C468850 @@@IA@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@ showed beneficial effects on the @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @DISEASE_Non_alcoholic_Fatty_Liver_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D065626 @@@NAFLD@@@ by lowering the liver weight, liver index and plasma levels of alanine aminotransferase and aspartate aminotransferase, regulating abnormal metabolism of @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipids@@@ and ameliorating @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@steatosis@@@ in liver.

citations.NLM: Lu YW, Zhu YC, Zhang L, Li P, Yang J, Wen XD. Ilexgenin A enhances the effects of simvastatin on non-alcoholic fatty liver disease without changes in simvastatin pharmacokinetics. Chin J Nat Med. 2018 Jun;16(6):436-445. PMID: 30047465

results.title: Effects of losartan and amlodipine alone or combined with simvastatin in hypertensive patients with nonalcoholic hepatic steatosis.
results.text_hl: The addition of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ therapy further decreased the @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@steatosis@@@ degree, SAT, and VAT diameter.

citations.NLM: Fogari R, Maffioli P, Mugellini A, Zoppi A, Lazzari P, Derosa G. Effects of losartan and amlodipine alone or combined with simvastatin in hypertensive patients with nonalcoholic hepatic steatosis. Eur J Gastroenterol Hepatol. 2012 Feb;24(2):164-71. PMID: 22081005

results.title: Perindopril and barnidipine alone or combined with simvastatin on hepatic steatosis and inflammatory parameters in hypertensive patients.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@Hepatic steatosis@@@ parameters improved only when @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was added.
